snippet: A congressional panel charged that the United States intelligence agencies’ research-and-development efforts were disorganized and unfocused.
abstract: Congressional panel created long before revelations about government electronic spying operations were made issues a blistering report charging that the intelligence world's research-and-development efforts are disorganized and unfocused; report concludes the United States is losing its technological superiority over its rivals and in some cases they are stealing American inventions.
lead_paragraph: A congressional panel charged that the United States intelligence agencies’ research-and-development efforts were disorganized and unfocused.

headline.main: U.S. Is Losing Advantage in Spying, Report Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. Is Losing Advantage In Spying, Report Says

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
